JUnit-addons, version 3.7.1
API specification

JUnit-addons is a collection of classes for JUnit, a Java testing framework.

See:
          Description

Packages
junitx.ant Provides classes that integrate some of JUnit-addons functionalities for the Ant build tool.
junitx.framework Provides classes that extend the junit framework.
junitx.tool Provides classes that are meant to be used externally to the framework or the test classes.
junitx.util Provides classes that can be used by the test classes for enhance functionalities.

 

JUnit-addons is a collection of classes for JUnit, a Java testing framework.

We appreciate constructive feedback and welcome patches or codes. This project will be collaborative or will not be. Since it is targeted to developers who can code, implementing instead of requesting is the rule. This beeing said, if you want to contribute, welcome aboard!

Hosted on SourceForge
  • Website: junit-addons.sourceforge.net
  • Project page: sourceforge.net/projects/junit-addons

Contributors
